attributes.action: state how many signatories would be required for the government to take notice and possibly change its policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the government has totally ignored the 1.8 million people who signed the vehicle tracking and road pricing policy petition and the 128,000 who signed the inheritance tax petition would they be prepared to say exactly how many people need to sign a petition for them to actually take notice of it??

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
